name: Chocolatier 4
description: So Big Splash Games went out of business at some point between 2009 and now (R.I.P. Big Splash) and they were the developers of the Chocolatier series of games, so I decided to make my own version. This will be updated, I do have plans for it, like a world map to go around the world on, and making the cities larger and have more places to explore in them.
